Angularjs-nvd3-directives

Angular.js directives for nvd3.js

View the Project on GitHub cmaurer/angularjs-nvd3-directives

  • Download ZIP File
  • Download TAR Ball
  • View On GitHub
Home # Line Charts # Stacked Area Charts

Quickly create D3.js charts with Angular.js

AngularJS directive directives for nvd3.js. The goal of this project is to allow for easier integration between nvd3.js and AngularJS.

Creating d3.js charts, simplified

  • Scaffold Angular.js, d3.js, and nvd3.js
<script src="../build/components/angular/angular.js"></script>
<script src="../build/components/d3/d3.js"></script>
<script src="../build/components/nvd3/nv.d3.js"></script>
<script src="../dist/angularjs-nvd3-directives.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="../bower_components/nvd3/src/nv.d3.css"/>
  • Create Angular.js app
<script>
	var app = angular.module("nvd3TestApp", ['nvd3ChartDirectives']);

	function ExampleCtrl($scope){
	}
</script>

<body ng-app='nvd3TestApp'>
<div ng-controller="ExampleCtrl">
</div>
</body>

  • Add directive to Angular.js App
<div ng-controller="ExampleCtrl">
    <nvd3-line-chart
        data="exampleData"
        id="exampleId"
        width="500"
        height="200"
        showXAxis="true"
        showYAxis="true"
        margin="{left:70,top:10,bottom:10,right:10}">
        <svg></svg>
    </nvd3-line-chart>
</div>
